Text: Deals Deal Cc Hi Tom Deal we were billed for the total deal volume MMBtu but we only show receiving MMBtudiff of MMBtu Deal we are being billed on the deal volume and not the actual volumes I could not find the contract in Sitara to verify if we are to be billed on deal volumes and not actuals How are we to adjust the variances from the deal volumes to the actuals Could you please shed some light on these issues or at least guide me to someone who can Thanks Kay Khan ENAClient Services Kay nroncom Original Message From Masters Dan Sent Thursday October PM To Khan Kay Ellstrom Diane Cc Cashin Janine Kaiser Jared Subject RE Billing Differences Kay On below Jared Kaiser had a deal with someone at ENA it may have been Tom Donahoe for the piece you are missing Sept Please check with Tom to see if it didnt get into the system Original Message From Khan Kay Sent Wednesday October AM To Ellstrom Diane Cc Cashin Janine Masters Dan Subject Billing Differences Hi Diane I have some billing discrepancies September Invoice EGK Deal the volume should be MMBtu I have attached the printscreens from Sitara showing the actual volumesThe sheet is named invegk Invoice EGK Deal Sept Sept the volume should be MMBtu I have attached the printscreens from Sitara showing the actual volumesThe sheets are named invegka thru d July Invoice EGK Deal the price was NX USDMMBtu NX for July was so the actual price should have been You have billed us Please let me know if these changes can be made and if you can send me corrected invoices File LNGDiffSeptInvxls Kay Khan ENAClient Services Kay nroncom
